thread.title: Arvind Kejriwal inaugurates plant to recycle waste water
thread.title_full: Arvind Kejriwal inaugurates plant to recycle waste water | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Arvind Kejriwal inaugurates plant to recycle waste water
text:
Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Thursday inaugurated a plant to recycle waste water, adding that hundereds of such units will solve the sewer and water problem in the city.
Arvind Kejriwal shared the information via twitter.
“Today, we inaugurated a small plant to recycle wastewater to potable quality. I myself drank that water(1/2),” he posted.
“Hundreds of such small plants all over delhi will solve sewer n water problem of delhi in next few years(2/2),” he added.
 09, 2015 1:37 pm
